sentence.Network_en: He proved overconfident on the witness stand, misremembering a key piece of evidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他在证人席上表现得过于自信，记错了一条重要的证据。

sentence.Network_en: She warned me against being overconfident.
sentence.Network_cn: 她告诫我不要过于自信.

sentence.Network_en: People who are overconfident tend to neglect their deficiencies.
sentence.Network_cn: 过分自信的人容易忽视自己的不足.
